title: i want to transfer my na accounts to oce

replies.body:
Hey man, 

If you were playing on the NA accounts from OCE prior to the free transfers being applied then you should still be able to transfer free of charge AFAIK, at least, that was the case the last time I checked my NA account (still haven't transferred it)

If not maybe have a go contacting [Player Support](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new), they should be able to help you out.
